h1. maistre - github powered project management

*Adam Rensel's Code*

p. I did this project along with 3 other people over the course of a week, we were all learning coldfusion at the time.

p. My role for this project was project management and code architecture.

h2. Features

* Portfolio pages are automatically generated from projects you are involved in.
* create/edit projects and assign tasks to other maistre members. 
* tasks can be attached to commits from github.
